name: uncapitalized
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
An uncapitalized word is not written with capital letters or with the first letter as a capital letter: People's names are often uncapitalised in logins and email addresses.
More examplesFewer examplesThe term "god", uncapitalized, occurs in many other religions.I noticed when I sent an email to my work account that my name was coming out uncapitalised.The uncapitalized typography represents the company’s preferred format.Names are given initial capitalization when they name specific features (the Rocky Mountains), but remain uncapitalized when they denote a generic phenomenon (the mountains).
